title: Drawing, "Low building with triple-ordered arcade"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash

Drawing, "Low building with triple-ordered arcade".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-8625.
